p.d: Eden, Maya, Anissa: three inseparable friends. When Eden decides to stop part-time prostitution, Maya continues without remorse. Anissa would like to but is hung-up about being overweight. Attached to their freedom, dreaming of love, they head for Paris and spend their earnings on luxury goods. Until Anissa is arrested... Directed by: Olivier Daran (France, 2018) Screenplay: Jacques Kirsner, based on the book by Rose Émilien Cast: Donia Eden (Eden), Pauline Parigot (Maya), Lorry Hardel (Anissa), Nicolas Briançon (Xavier de Louhan), Ilias Le Doré (Karim), Farida Khelfa (Anna), Marianne Basler (Bénédicte de Louhan) Genre: comedy
